name: Slimes RPG
description:
"Slimes RPG" is an RPG game based on an environment and spatial themes, with references and influences of many spatial science fiction classics in popular culture

In this game you will be incarnated in an engineer who wakes up in his ship and discovers that many of his companions are no longer there, but they have been supplanted by monsters.
Throughout history you will meet other survivors and try to solve the problem.
In this game you will find a great adventure with fights, puzzles and riddles.

What to expect:

-Funny gameplay and plot.

-Puzzles and riddles.

-Space ambientation

How to play:

-WASD to move

-Space to interact
